title: How can I tell if the battery has finished charging?
answer:
If you are charging when the phone is switched on, press the power button to turn on the screen. The battery is fully charged when the battery icon in the status bar changes to![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111833) or the charging status on the lock screen is Charged. 

 If you are charging when the phone is switched off, press the power button to turn on the screen. The battery is fully charged when the charging indicator on the screen displays 100%. 

 * The icons are for reference purposes only; please refer to the phone's actual interface.
